concept.title: Output Settings
concept.shortdesc: This topic covers Simple output mode. You can set the output quality of your stream using these settings.

conbody.p: Generally, you should keep the default settings unless you know why you need to change it.

ul.li: Video Bitrate: set the bitrate for your streaming video quality
Encoder: set the encoder to use
Audio Bitrate: set the bitrate for your streaming audio quality
